issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.81 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #49924d, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.81 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #49924d, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.82:1. Recommendation:  change background to #3c8540.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.82:1. Recommendation:  change background to #3c8540.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > div > button

automatic.name: Headings; Wrong Order, Empty & Missing Headings;

issues.title: Heading levels should only increase by one
issues.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

issues.title: Heading elements are not in a sequentially-descending order
issues.description: Properly ordered headings that do not skip levels convey the semantic structure of the page, making it easier to navigate and understand when using assistive technologies. [Learn more about heading order](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/heading-order).

node.nodeLabel: Price Inflation for Citrus fruits since 1997

Fix any of the following:
